<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Customer_MD_v1</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    } 
	// This script will execute base on the selection of request type , account group and country selected by requestor 
	//The Entire script only involves in Displaying, Hiding and setting fields mandatory in a Nested IF Logic
    //This Script Comprises of 4 sections of each defined for a request type and each request type comprises 7 account group specific logics 
	//country specific logics are nested separately for each request type and account group 
	
    var req = g_form.getValue('request_type');  
    var grp = g_form.getValue('customer_account_group');
    var entityname = g_form.getValue('entity_name');  
	g_form.setReadOnly("customer_industry",true); 
	g_form.setReadOnly("customer_division",true);  
	g_form.setReadOnly("customer_bu_focus_industry",true); 
    g_form.setDisplay('approval_label', true); 
	g_form.clearValue("customer_sub_industry"); 
	
	
	
	
// Logic for creation request type starts here, following are the common fields for all account group when request type creation is selected 
	
    if (req == 'Creation') { //start of creation 
        g_form.setDisplay('to_add_attachment', true);
        g_form.setDisplay('comments', true);
        g_form.setDisplay('general_information', true); 
        g_form.setMandatory('name_1', true);
        g_form.setDisplay('name_1', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('name_2', false);  
        g_form.setMandatory('name_3', false);
        g_form.setDisplay('name_2', true); 
        g_form.setDisplay('name_3', true); 
        g_form.setMandatory('search_term_1', true);  
        g_form.setDisplay('search_term_1', true); 
        g_form.setMandatory('search_term_2', false);
        g_form.setDisplay('search_term_2', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('address_1', true);
        g_form.setDisplay('address_1', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('address_2', false);
        g_form.setDisplay('address_2', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('address_3', false); 
        g_form.setDisplay('address_3', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('city', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('region', false);
        g_form.setDisplay('region', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('u_country', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('transportation_zone', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('general_tel_no', true);  
        g_form.setMandatory('mobile_no', false);
        g_form.setDisplay('mobile_no', true);  
        g_form.setMandatory('general_fax_no', false);
        g_form.setDisplay('general_fax_no', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('general_email', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('comments', false);
        g_form.setDisplay('comments', true);
        
		// Additional ship to details Variable set 
	g_form.setMandatory('additional_ship_to_details',false); 
	g_form.setDisplay('additional_ship_to_details',true);
		
// postal code is optional only for hong kong and vietnam 
        if (newValue == 'Hong Kong'||  newValue == 'Vietnam' ) { 
            g_form.setMandatory('postal_code', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('postal_code', true);
        }

        // postal code is mandatory for other countries
        if ((newValue == 'Australia' || newValue == 'Bangladesh' || newValue == 'Malaysia' || newValue == 'New Zealand' || newValue == 'Indonesia' || newValue == 'South Korea' || newValue == 'Philippines' || newValue == 'Thailand' || newValue == 'India' || newValue == 'Singapore'|| newValue == 'China'||  newValue == 'Taiwan')) { //china and NEWTO 
            g_form.setMandatory('postal_code', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('postal_code', true);
        }


        //contact information variable set

            g_form.setMandatory('contact_information1', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('contact_information1', true);

        } 
// additional ship to details variable set is hidden for BSAP account group
        if (grp == 'BSAP - Sales Person') {
			g_form.setMandatory('currency', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('contact_information1', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('sales_person_partner_function', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('incoterm_1', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('incoterm_2', false);

            g_form.setMandatory('gst_vat_registration_no', false); 
            g_form.setMandatory('vendor_code', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('trading_partner', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('crm_customer_prospect_id', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_classification', false);

            g_form.setMandatory('customer_potential', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_industry', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_sub_industry', false); 
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_division', false); 
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_bu_focus_industry', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('reconciliation_account', false); 
            g_form.setMandatory('payment_term', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('payment_method', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('dunning_procedure', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('interest_indicator', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('dunning_email_1', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('dunning_email_2', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('dunning_fax_no', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('account_memo', false);  
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_pricing_procedure', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('shipping_conditions', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('default_delivering_plant', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('incoterm_1', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('incoterm_2', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('account_assignment_group', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('brenntag_connect_features', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('tax_classification', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('order_combination', false);   
            g_form.setMandatory('exchange_rate_type', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('sales_office', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('accountinfo', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('shipping', true); 
            g_form.setDisplay('contact_information1', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('business_registration_no', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('gst_vat_registration_no', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('vendor_code', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('trading_partner', false); 
            g_form.setDisplay('crm_customer_prospect_id', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_classification', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('gka_mnc_indicator', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_potential', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_industry', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_sub_industry', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_division', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_bu_focus_industry', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('reconciliation_account', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('payment_term', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('payment_method', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('dunning_procedure', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('interest_indicator', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('dunning_email_1', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('dunning_email_2', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('dunning_fax_no', false);

            g_form.setDisplay('shipping_conditions', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('default_delivering_plant', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('incoterm_1', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('incoterm_2', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('account_assignment_group', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('brenntag_connect_features', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('tax_classification', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('order_combination', false);   
            g_form.setDisplay('exchange_rate_type', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('sales_person_partner_function', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('sales_office', false);
			g_form.setMandatory('additional_ship_to_details',false);
	g_form.setDisplay('additional_ship_to_details',false);


        }

        if (grp == 'BSTC - Ship To Customer') {
            g_form.setMandatory('contact_information1', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('contact_information1', true);
        }

        if ((grp == 'BTCU - Trade Customer' || grp == 'BNTC - Non Trade Customer' || grp == 'BSTC - Ship To Customer' || grp == 'BINC - Intercompany' || grp == 'BBTP - Bill To Party')) {

            if ((newValue == 'Australia' || newValue == 'Bangladesh' || newValue == 'Malaysia' || newValue == 'New Zealand' || newValue == 'Taiwan' || newValue == 'Indonesia' || newValue == 'South Korea' || newValue == 'Philippines' || newValue == 'Thailand' || newValue == 'Hong Kong' || newValue == 'Vietnam' || newValue == 'China' || newValue == 'Singapore')) { // add newto 
				g_form.setDisplay('customer_account_information', true);
                g_form.setMandatory('business_registration_no', false);
                g_form.setMandatory('gst_vat_registration_no', false);
                g_form.setMandatory('vendor_code', false);
                g_form.setDisplay('business_registration_no', true); 
                g_form.setDisplay('gst_vat_registration_no', true);
                g_form.setDisplay('vendor_code', true);
            }

            if (newValue == 'India') {
				g_form.setDisplay('customer_account_information', true);
                g_form.setMandatory('business_registration_no', false);
                g_form.setMandatory('gst_vat_registration_no', true);
                g_form.setMandatory('vendor_code', false);
                g_form.setDisplay('business_registration_no', true);
                g_form.setDisplay('gst_vat_registration_no', true); 
                g_form.setDisplay('vendor_code', true);
            }
            if (grp == 'BTCU - Trade Customer') {

                if (newValue == 'China') { 
                    g_form.setMandatory('crm_customer_prospect_id', false);
                    g_form.setDisplay('crm_customer_prospect_id', false);
                }
				// if country is newto crm id is hidden 
		if ((entityname == 'Neuto Chemical Corp.')) {
           g_form.setMandatory('crm_customer_prospect_id', false);
           g_form.setDisplay('crm_customer_prospect_id', false); 
			
				// if country is taiwan crm id is mandatory
        } else if ((entityname == 'Brenntag Taiwan Co., Ltd.')) { 
            g_form.setMandatory('crm_customer_prospect_id', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('crm_customer_prospect_id', true);

        }
                if ((newValue == 'Australia' || newValue == 'Bangladesh' || newValue == 'Malaysia' || newValue == 'New Zealand' || newValue == 'Indonesia' || newValue == 'South Korea' || newValue == 'Philippines' || newValue == 'Thailand' || newValue == 'Hong Kong' || newValue == 'Vietnam' || newValue == 'India' || newValue == 'Singapore')) {

                }

            if (grp == 'BSTC - Ship To Customer') {

                g_form.setMandatory('payment_method', false);
                g_form.setDisplay('payment_method', true);

                g_form.setDisplay('trading_partner', false);
            }

            g_form.setMandatory('crm_customer_prospect_id', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('crm_customer_prospect_id', false);
        }

        if ((grp == 'BTCU - Trade Customer' || grp == 'BNTC - Non Trade Customer' || grp == 'BINC - Intercompany' || grp == 'BBTP - Bill To Party' || grp == 'BINS - Commission - Vendor')) {
			g_form.setDisplay('customer_account_information', true);
			g_form.setDisplay('customerdetails', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_classification', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_classification', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('reconciliation_account', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('reconciliation_account', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('payment_term', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('payment_term', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('payment_method', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('payment_method', true);
        }

        if ((grp == 'BTCU - Trade Customer' || grp == 'BNTC - Non Trade Customer' || grp == 'BSTC - Ship To Customer' || grp == 'BINC - Intercompany' || grp == 'BBTP - Bill To Party' || grp == 'BINS - Commission - Vendor')) { //6 groups
			g_form.setDisplay('customer_account_information', true);
           g_form.setDisplay('customerdetails', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('gka_mnc_indicator', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('gka_mnc_indicator', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_potential', true);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_potential', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_sub_industry', true);
			g_form.setMandatory("customer_industry",false); 
	        g_form.setMandatory("customer_division",false);  
	        g_form.setMandatory("customer_bu_focus_industry",false); 
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_sub_industry', true);
			g_form.setDisplay("customer_industry",true); 
	        g_form.setDisplay("customer_division",true);  
	        g_form.setDisplay("customer_bu_focus_industry",true); 
           
        }


        if ((grp == 'BTCU - Trade Customer' || grp == 'BNTC - Non Trade Customer')) {
			g_form.setDisplay('customerdetails', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('customer_division', false);
            g_form.setDisplay('customer_division', true);

				g_form.setDisplay('accountinfo', true);
               g_form.setDisplay('shipping', true);
